meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Suzanne Judson-Whitehouse Bhibha Das Jan Zasowski Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6260.

td.p: Suzanne Judson-Whitehouse, an education program director from Greenfield, Massachusetts
Bhibha Das, a postdoctoral research associate originally from Mt. Zion, Illinois
Jan Zasowski, a stock trader from Chicago, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $46,601)

tr.td: THE GREAT AMERICAN NOVEL
MIDDLE INITIAL C.
GOING NATIONAL
(Alex: ...because you have to give us the nationality most associated with the items in the clue.)
SHADES OF GRAY
E-I-O
(Alex: Those letters in order.)
WALT DISNEY
(Alex: Images from the [*] Family Museum in San Francisco.)

Suzanne

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jan
Bhibha
Suzanne
YOU'RE AN ANIMAL!
WHAT'S ON "TAP"?
VICE PRESIDENTS
NUTRITIONAL SUPPLEMENTS
ROCK'S FRONTMEN & WOMEN
(Alex: You identify the group.)

td.a: THE U.S. ARMY CORPS OF ENGINEERS

tr.td: (Sarah: ...from New Orleans, where some of the biggest projects in the Corps' history will protect residents from future disasters.)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
